rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entry with integrated shoe storage and minimalistic design elements

rooms.name: Living Room & Kitchen Combined
rooms.description: Open-plan living area that seamlessly integrates Scandinavian style living room with a modern kitchen. Vastu compliant with the south-eastern corner having a dedicated cooking station.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the combined living and kitchen area for a communal dining experience

rooms.name: Studio Apartment Bedroom
rooms.description: G+1 studio apartment bedroom with built-in storage. Vastu principle: positioned in the north-west corner for prosperity.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Full bathroom adjoining the studio apartment bedroom

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space integrated into the living area, designed with natural light and minimalistic Scandinavian aesthetics
